titles.title: A resolution providing for the consideration of a joint resolution to provide assistance and support for peace, democracy and reconciliation in Central America.

action.text: House Committee on Rules Reported an Original Measure. Report No: 100-507.
Called up by House as Privileged Matter.

bill.summary: 3/1/1988--Introduced. Sets forth the rule for the consideration of a joint resolution to provide assistance and support for peace, democracy, and reconciliation in Central America.
